INSERT INTO pact
ROW_ID, C_DT, UP_DT, C_ID, PID, CODE, TY_LV, NM_T, JL_ID, JL_CONT_ID, ST_LV, QD_DT, SJWC_DT, SJKS_DT, JHWC_DT, FF_DT, WTFY, DB_ID, CONT_ID, BU_ID, LS_T, STATE, CITY, COUNTY, STREET, FLG, EWM, TERMS, CM_TX, TJ_F,
#{row_id}, #{c_dt}, #{up_dt}, #{c_id}, #{pid}, #{code}, #{ty_lv}, #{nm_t}, #{jl_id}, #{jl_cont_id}, #{st_lv}, #{qd_dt}, #{sjwc_dt}, #{sjks_dt}, #{jhwc_dt}, #{ff_dt}, #{wtfy}, #{db_id}, #{cont_id}, #{bu_id}, #{ls_t}, #{state}, #{city}, #{county}, #{street}, #{flg}, #{ewm}, #{terms}, #{cm_tx}, #{tj_f},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
